attachments.title: Evolution Strategies as a Scalable Alternative to Reinforcement Learning
attachments.text: We've discovered that evolution strategies (ES), an optimization technique that's been known for decades, rivals the performance of standard reinforcement learning (RL) techniques on modern RL benchmarks (e.g. Atari/MuJoCo), while overcoming many of RL's inconveniences. In particular, ES is simpler to implement (there is no need for backpropagation)
attachments.fallback: OpenAI Blog: Evolution Strategies as a Scalable Alternative to Reinforcement Learning

fields.title: Filed under
fields.value: Andrej Karpathy, Tim Salimans, Jonathan Ho, Peter Chen, Ilya Sutskever, John Schulman, Greg Brockman, Szymon Sidor

text: Also, this seems pretty cool. Lots of smart people behind it and a good mission. <http://distill.pub/about/>

attachments.title: Distill
attachments.text: Machine Learning Research Should Be Clear, Dynamic and Vivid. Distill Is Here to Help.
